description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Accounting_Adjustment_Change_Reason_Code.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Contains a reference to the ID of the Accounting Adjustment Change Reason Code.

Accounting_Adjustment_Change_Reason_Code.description: The reference ID of the Accounting Adjustment Change Reason Code.
The name of the Accounting Adjustment Change Reason Code.
If true, the Accounting Adjustment Change Reason Code is inactive.

description: Contains the Accounting Adjustment Change Reason Code data.
